verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, If any one <S%H5315><s%> shall sin <S%H2398><s%> unwittingly <S%H7684><s%>, in any of the things which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H4687><s%> not to be done <S%H6213><s%>, and shall do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> one of them <S%H2007><s%>:

if the anointed <S%H4899><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> shall sin <S%H2398><s%> so as to bring guilt <S%H819><s%> on the people <S%H5971><s%>, then let him offer <S%H7126><s%> for his sin <S%H2403><s%>, which he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%>, a young <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and kill <S%H7819><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And the anointed <S%H4899><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> it to the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>:

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall dip <S%H2881><s%> his finger <S%H676><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H5414><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which is in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>; and all the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> shall he pour <S%H8210><s%> out at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, which is at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And all the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> he shall take off <S%H7311><s%> from it <S%H2459><s%>; the fat that covereth <S%H3680><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon the inwards <S%H7130><s%>,

and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon them <S%H3689><s%>, which is by the loins, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> upon the liver <S%H3516><s%>, with the kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, shall he take away <S%H5493><s%>,

as it is taken off <S%H7311><s%> from the ox <S%H7794><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>: and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>.

And the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and all its flesh <S%H1320><s%>, with its head <S%H7218><s%>, and with its legs <S%H3767><s%>, and its inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and its dung <S%H6569><s%>,

even the whole bullock <S%H6499><s%> shall he carry forth <S%H3318><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> unto a clean <S%H2889><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, where the ashes <S%H1880><s%> are poured out <S%H8211><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> it on wood <S%H6086><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: where <S%H413><s%> the ashes <S%H1880><s%> are poured out <S%H8211><s%> shall it be burnt <S%H8313><s%>.

And if the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> err <S%H7686><s%>, and the thing <S%H1697><s%> be hid <S%H5956><s%> from the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%>, and they have done <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of the things which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H4687><s%> not to be done <S%H6213><s%>, and are guilty <S%H816><s%>;

when the sin <S%H2403><s%> wherein they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> is known <S%H3045><s%>, then the assembly <S%H6951><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a young <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and the bullock <S%H6499><s%> shall be killed <S%H7819><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And the anointed <S%H4899><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> to the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>:

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall dip <S%H2881><s%> his finger <S%H676><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> it seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%>.

And he shall put <S%H5414><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> which is before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that is in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>; and all the blood <S%H1818><s%> shall he pour out <S%H8210><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, which is at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.
And all the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof shall he take <S%H7311><s%> off from it <S%H6999><s%>, and burn it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

Thus shall he do <S%H6213><s%> with the bullock <S%H6499><s%>; as he did <S%H6213><s%> with the bullock <S%H6499><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, so shall he do <S%H6213><s%> with this <S%H3548><s%>; and the priest shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them <S%H5545><s%>, and they shall be forgiven.

And he shall carry forth <S%H3318><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> it as he burned <S%H8313><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>: it is the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> for the assembly <S%H6951><s%>.

When a ruler <S%H5387><s%> sinneth <S%H2398><s%>, and doeth <S%H6213><s%> unwittingly <S%H7684><s%> any <S%H259><s%> one of all the things which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H4687><s%> not to be done <S%H6213><s%>, and is guilty <S%H816><s%>;

if his sin <S%H2403><s%>, wherein he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%>, be made known <S%H3045><s%> to him <S%H935><s%>, he shall bring for his oblation <S%H7133><s%> a <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%>, a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>.

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the goat <S%H8163><s%>, and kill <S%H7819><s%> it in the place <S%H4725><s%> where they kill <S%H7819><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: it is a sin-offering <S%H5930><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> with his finger <S%H676><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>; and the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof shall he pour out <S%H8210><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>.

And all the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof shall he burn <S%H6999><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, as the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H2077><s%>; and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him as concerning his sin <S%H2403><s%>, and he shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%>.

And if any <S%H259><s%> one <S%H5315><s%> of the common <S%H776><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> unwittingly <S%H7684><s%>, in doing <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of the things which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H4687><s%> not to be done <S%H6213><s%>, and be guilty <S%H816><s%>;

if his sin <S%H2403><s%>, which he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%>, be made known <S%H3045><s%> to him <S%H935><s%>, then he shall bring for his oblation <S%H7133><s%> a <S%H8166><s%> goat <S%H8166><s%>, a female <S%H5347><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, for his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%>.

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and kill <S%H7819><s%> the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof with his finger <S%H676><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>; and all the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof shall he pour out <S%H8210><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And all the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof shall he take away <S%H5493><s%>, as the fat <S%H2459><s%> is taken away <S%H5493><s%> from off the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>; and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him <S%H5545><s%>, and he shall be forgiven.
And if he bring <S%H935><s%> a lamb <S%H3532><s%> as his oblation for a <S%H2403><s%> sin-offering <S%H7133><s%>, he shall bring <S%H935><s%> it a female <S%H5347><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>.

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and kill <S%H7819><s%> it for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where they kill <S%H7819><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> with his finger <S%H676><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>; and all the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof shall he pour out <S%H8210><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And all the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof shall he take away <S%H5493><s%>, as the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the lamb <S%H3775><s%> is taken away <S%H5493><s%> from the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>; and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%>, upon the offerings of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>; and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him as touching his sin <S%H2403><s%> that he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and he shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%>.
